entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
